A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
ALERT:  watch the Youtube discussions of this film.  
I encourage everyone to read some of the now non-canon books and other stories about Star Wars.  They far exceed the capacity of this Sci-Fi tragedy.  
Star Wars used to get people through rough times.  It encouraged young people to rise to the occasion and strike at evil while learning enough about themselves to make their own judgments.  
This movie throws away all of that.  There is nothing to learn\, nothing to explore\, and nothing to love.  
This film would not spawn novels\, video games\, and dreams in its likeness\, but the originals did.
